root.title: PowerShell Write-EventLog Usage
root.description: Detects usage of the "Write-EventLog" cmdlet with 'RawData' flag. The cmdlet can be levreage to write malicious payloads to the EventLog and then retrieve them later for later use
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled

falsepositives.item: Legitimate applications writing events via this cmdlet. Investigate alerts to determine if the action is benign
